subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a night that was dedicated to the legacy of Jackie Robinson, the Yankees rode a three-run homer by Robinson Cano and hung on with a save from their No. 42, Mariano Rivera.
snippet: On a night that was dedicated to the legacy of Jackie Robinson, the Yankees rode a three-run homer by Robinson Cano and hung on with a save from their No. 42, Mariano Rivera.
